instruction: Categorize the comment on the basis of sexual explicitness. If the comment is sexually explicit output Yes, otherwise output No.
input: Come on Frank . Is it in your DNA to be uncivil ?   You ask a fair question until you have to resort to schoolyard name calling.   As to your question , I had families to raise .
